deployment_relevant_files: README.md (mentions Terraform-based deployment, but no .tf files present in repo)
architectural_resources: Amazon API Gateway (public HTTPS endpoint; described in README)
Amazon S3 bucket (lists bucket contents; BUCKET_NAME env var used in lambda_function.py)
AWS IAM role/policy for Lambda to call s3:ListObjectsV2 (implied by boto3 S3 usage)
Amazon CloudWatch Logs (implied by Lambda logging/print; also mentioned in README)
